member.name: T:Ucommerce.EntitiesV2.AmountOffOrderTotalAward
member.summary: A class which represents the uCommerce_AmountOffOrderTotalAward table in the Ucommerce Database.
Adds a order level discount with a fixed amount.
member.remarks: Order level discounts are expected to be attached to the order only, but differentiated VAT rates makes this impossible as we need the line prices with accompanying VAT rate to correctly calculate VAT for an item. Will check whether we're dealing with differentiated VAT. If we are then attaches the discount to all items. Pipeline will spread the discount across lines according to their relative value.

member.name: T:Ucommerce.OverridableLazy`1
member.summary: Wraps any property that can either be set by a setter, or retrieved using an (expensive) operation. Think of it as a System.Lazy<T> with a setter added. Guarantees zero or once semantics to limit the cost of the expensive retrieval. If the setter is used first, the factory method given to the constructor will never be called. If the getter is used first, the factory method is called once, and only once. The type is thread safe.

member.name: M:Ucommerce.OverridableLazy`1.#ctor(System.Func{`0})
member.summary: Create a lazy evaluated, overridable property wrapper
member.param: A lambda wrapping a constructor or some expensive load operation that you want to minimize.

member.name: M:Ucommerce.Transactions.Payments.PaymentUrlInformation.ExtractInformation(System.Web.HttpRequest)
member.summary: Extract payment information from the given .
member.remarks: It uses the URL to extract information from, in the following format: example 1.1. /{somedir}/{someotherdir}/{PaymentMethodName}/{PaymentGuid}/file.axd example 1.2. /{somedir}/{someotherdir}/{PaymentMethodName}/{PaymentId}/file.axd example 2.1. /{PaymentMethodName}/{PaymentGuid}/otherfile.axsd example 2.2. /{PaymentMethodName}/{PaymentId}/otherfile.axsd The '/' is used as the spilt character, so the PaymentGuid/PaymentId is the array[Length - 2] and the PaymentMethodName is: array[Length - 3]
member.exception: Ìf the does not contain at least 2 subdirectories.
member.returns: A with the information.

member.name: T:Ucommerce.Tree.Impl.TreeContentService
member.summary:
This is the default implementation of the tree content service, responsible for building the core structure of the Ucommerce tree.
When a node type is passed to the service, all the registered content providers that supports the type will be asked to deliver child nodes. The combined nodes are returned in the order the providers are registered.

member.summary: A tree child provider is responsible for returning the child nodes for a node identified by a nodeType and possibly an id.

member.summary: Given a node type and possibly an id, the provider returnes a list of child nodes.
member.returns: A list of child nodes for the node.

member.name: T:Ucommerce.Tree.ITreeContentProvider
member.summary: A content provider is a child node provider who can also tell if a given node type is supported.

member.name: M:Ucommerce.Tree.ITreeContentProvider.Supports(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true, if the provider supports a specific tree node type.
member.returns: true, if the node type is supported by the provider.
